mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ISO_AUTH_COMPANY_ITEM(COM_CODE, AUTH_TYPE, AUTH_CODE, AUTH_DATE, EXP_DATE, REG_DW_USER_IDX, UP_DW_USER_IDX, REG_DATE, UP_DATE, ITEM_STATE, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH) VALUES (#{COM_CODE}, #{AUTH_TYPE}, #{AUTH_CODE}, #{AUTH_DATE}, #{EXP_DATE}, 1, 1, sysdate, sysdate, 'SAVE', #{FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_PATH})

INSERT INTO AUTH_COMPANY_INFO(COM_CODE, APPROVE_STATE, SEND_DATE, POINT, AUTH_TYPE, REG_DW_USER_IDX, UP_DW_USER_IDX, REG_DATE, UP_DATE) VALUES (#{COM_CODE}, #{APPROVE_STATE}, sysdate, #{POINT}, #{AUTH_TYPE}, 1, 1, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from ISO_AUTH_COMPANY_ITEM where AUTH_CODE=#{AUTH_CODE} and COM_CODE=#{COM_CODE}

SELECT RN, COM_CODE, COM_NAME, AUTH_TYPE, APPROVE_STATE, APPROVE_DATE, SEND_DATE, POINT FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(ISO_AUTH_COMPANY_ITEM PK_ISO_AUTH_COMPANY_ITEM) */ ROWNUM RN, ACI.COM_CODE, CC.COM_NAME, AUTH_TYPE, APPROVE_STATE, APPROVE_DATE, SEND_DATE, POINT FROM AUTH_COMPANY_INFO ACI INNER JOIN COMPANY_CODE CC ON CC.COM_CODE = ACI.COM_CODE WHERE 1 =1
AND (ACI.COM_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_CODE}), '%'))
AND (CC.COM_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_NAME}), '%'))
AND (ACI.APPROVE_STATE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_STATUS}), '%'))
AND ROWNUM <= (#{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.amount})
) WHERE RN > ((#{criteria.pageNum}-1) * #{criteria.amount})

select count(*) CNT from AUTH_COMPANY_INFO ACI INNER JOIN COMPANY_CODE CC ON CC.COM_CODE = ACI.COM_CODE WHERE 1 =1
AND (ACI.COM_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_CODE}), '%'))
AND (CC.COM_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_NAME}), '%'))
AND (ACI.APPROVE_STATE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_STATUS}), '%'))

SELECT RN, COM_CODE, COM_NAME, AUTH_TYPE, AUTH_CODE, AUTH_DATE, EXP_DATE, REG_DATE, UP_DATE, ITEM_STATE, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(ISO_AUTH_COMPANY_ITEM PK_ISO_AUTH_COMPANY_ITEM) */ ROWNUM RN, ACI.COM_CODE, CC.COM_NAME, AUTH_TYPE, AUTH_CODE, AUTH_DATE, EXP_DATE, ACI.REG_DATE, ACI.UP_DATE, ITEM_STATE, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM ISO_AUTH_COMPANY_ITEM ACI INNER JOIN COMPANY_CODE CC ON CC.COM_CODE = ACI.COM_CODE WHERE 1 =1
AND (ACI.COM_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_CODE}), '%'))
AND (CC.COM_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_NAME}), '%'))
AND (ACI.EXP_DATE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{EXP_DATE}), '%'))
AND ROWNUM <= (#{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.amount})
) WHERE RN > ((#{criteria.pageNum}-1) * #{criteria.amount})
mapper.update: update ISO_AUTH_COMPANY_ITEM set ITEM_STATE=#{ITEM_STATE} where COM_CODE=#{COM_CODE}
